price: 23. Waa Annaga (Allaah) Kuwa wax nooleeya, waxna dhinsiiya8,  Annagaana ah dhaxlayaasha9.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ
footnotes:
8. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: “Hadduu qofka aadmiga ahi dhinto waxaa go’a camalkiisa marka laga reebo seddex arrimood: Sadaqa joogto ah (waqaf), cilmi lagu intifaaco, ama ilmo wanaagsan oo u soo duceeya. (W.w. Muslim).
 9. Allaah subxaanahu wa tacaalaa baa hara markay uunka oo dhan dhintaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
